page.title: 10THE CHURCHES OF HAREFIELD
page.content: The parish church of St.Mary the Virgin has an electoral roll of approximately 190.There are about 64 baptisms annually, with some 25 children in regular Sunday School attendance.Funds are raised via a Summer Fete and a Christmas Bazaar. Groups associated with the church are the Mother's Union,the Young Wives, a Youth Club, an excellent choir and a bellringer's group. The Methodist Chapel (1834) has to be demolished due to its dangerous condition.The Baptist Chapel(1834) has a congregation of 35, a Sunday School of 28 and a Women's Fellowship.The church is strongly evangelical. The R.C. church of St.Paul has an attendance of 160 - 170,a Youth group, a Social Club and a Women's League. Both C.of E. and R.C. churches support overseas missions.
